item.description:
From our friends: Larry & Geralyn

Come cheer on Larry and Geralyn as they prepare for the San Diego Rock n' Roll Marathon, benefiting the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (LLS). We've been training hard and are ready to celebrate the approach of our goal. Help us raise money for this great cause by celebrating with us at Encore in North Providence. Thanks to Chef and Owner, Paul Jalaf, your full $20 goes directly to LLS. There will be free appetizers, live music, a cash bar with $5.00 drinks for the ladies, and door prizes.

Search our Rhunning Rhodies team page on Facebook. Please contact us at rhunningrhodies@gmail.com to purchase your $20 ticket in advance.

--
Geralyn Hoffman
I am training for the San Diego Rock n' Roll Marathon! Visit my website to find out more http://pages.teamintr...
item.name: Larry and Geralyn's Send-off Celebration and Fundraiser
